Single line wrap for string

Source: R/str_wrap_n_single.R
str_wrap_n_single.Rd

Single line wrap for string

Usage

str_wrap_n_single(string = NULL, n = 2)

Arguments

string

string from str_wrap_n

n

n from from str_wrap_n

Value

String with line breaks
